title: Maintain and build upon an iOS IONIC application
desc: Our team requires developers to maintain and update an Ionic 1 project based on project manager requirements. The app is currently in Beta, and we want to further develop this based on beta user feedback. The app is developed for iOS, and we wish to build the app further before releasing it to the app store.The project is a simple forum based application with the ability for users to post tasks, apply to tasks and chat with each other. No in app monetary transactions are involved.We are looking for full-stack developers to help us build the app further. The app is currently in Beta, with Beta users testing the app and providing feedback on a regular basis. We want to build the app further, adding enhancements to existing features and building new features.Tech Requirements:We are looking for full-stack developers who do not simply follow instructions, but who can think critically, are opinionated and can act as a technological guide for the project.We will be following an agile methodology to develop the app, ideally 3 week sprints. We will be working together at all times to scope out requirements for every sprint, prioritize and build on the app.Culture Fit Requirements:Apart from technical expertise, we also expect the applicants to be comfortable working with other developers in tandem, in a respectful and flexible manner. We are a group of people working remotely from different parts of the world, so clear and fluid communication between team members if very crucial to a fluid and harmonious work environment and towards to overall growth of the product as well.Tech Requirements1.	At least one year of experience developing Ionic 1 apps for the iOS market2.	Experience with Google Firebase for the database and push notifications3.	Experience with AngularJS4.	Experience with working in an agile product management environment5.	Experience with Git and GitHub6.	Experience working with remote teams in a respectable fashionTerminationWe, the Client reserves the right to terminate the developer’s at any given time. The Agreement shall be terminated in the event each of the parties fail to perform their obligation under this Agreement. For termination, each of the parties shall give in writing at least fifteen days (15) notice by the aggrieved party to the defaulting party for remedy. If no remedial action is taken within this fifteen days(15), the Client reserves the right to terminate the contract.

title: Mobile Application development
desc: IntroductionThe mobile application which needs to be developed will be used by the users in order to manage their medication, appointments to a medical unit, examinations, and services. Most of the actions within the mobile application must be synchronized and managed by an external system for which the REST API documentation will be provided.Basic Requirements- Multilanguage support- Receive Google Firebase PUSH notifications (notification will be initiated by an external system)- Current medication view- Request for prescription renewal- Appointment history list- Appointment request- Appointment cancellation- Pending examinations and referrals list- DR history list- DR service request- Manual recording of laboratory exam results- Manual recording of measurement results- Button to directly call a landline number- Integrated educational material on related topic (will be provided)- Integrated mobile application user manualSecurity- SSL will be used for all communication with REST API- Data are stored locally temporarily and will be synced to an external system via REST API- Each user must log in with username and password- During registration, the user must provide a verification code which is already provided to him in written. Verification code is validated by calling a REST API
